summary: 1991  was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Kevin Peter Hall  was an American actor best known for his roles as the title character in the first two films in the Predator franchise and the title character of Harry in the film and television series, Harry and the Hendersons. He also appeared in the television series Misfits of Science and 227 along with the film, Without Warning.
title: Kevin Peter Hall
